hero.title: Private Rental Space for Children's Events
hero.text: We handle the setup so you can have a funtastique time.

gallery.title: Our Gallery
gallery.subtitle: ✨ Tap any image for a FUNtastique close-up view of our space & activities! ✨

services.title: What's Included in Your Funtastique Package
services.description: We make kids' parties simple, fun, and stress-free for parents. Just bring the cake, food and the kids, we'll handle the rest so you can enjoy the celebration too!

venue.title: Private Venue just for your party
venue.description: Enjoy a 1500 sq ft fully private space just for you and your guests—no shared bookings, ever.

host.title: Party Host to help with the party
host.description: Your dedicated host helps with everything from serving food to post-party cleanup so you can relax and enjoy the celebration.

decorations.title: Customized Decorations & Activities
decorations.description: Bring your party to life with your child's favorite decorations. We also offer activities like cupcake decorating, ice-cream making, bracelet making for a small extra price.

facilities.title: Includes a Kitchen, TV, Sound System & More
facilities.description: Make the most of your event with access to a lot of toys, full kitchen, TV set, sound system, and chairs, tables or anything else you could need.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.text: Centre Funtastique was started by a mom who knows just how wild (and wonderful) kids' parties can be. Our goal? Make celebrating easy, fun, and totally unforgettable — with all the magic and none of the mess!

reviews.title: Stress FREE Parents
reviews.heroDescription: See what our happy families have to say about their Funtastique parties! Our greatest joy is seeing your glowing reviews.
reviews.ctaDescription: We'd love to hear about your experience! New reviews help us and help other parents planning their perfect party.

q1.question: What is Centre Funtastique?
q1.answer: Centre Funtastique is a small and private venue for children's events (maximum capacity of 50 people).

q2.question: How much does it cost to host my party at Centre Funtastique?
q2.answer: We charge $375 for 3 hours. Currently, we have a special promo: $350 for 4 hours! For an extra cost, you can keep the party going.

q3.question: What's included in the package?
q3.answer: A fully private party! With 1 host (helps with setup, spills, party games etc), access to a fully equipped kitchen (microwave, stove, oven, etc), entertainment system (TV, sound system, chairs, tables), and 5 parking spaces included.

q4.question: Can I visit the venue before my party?
q4.answer: Yes, please contact us to arrange a visit. We can also discuss custom decorations and themes for your party.

q5.question: Can you make a custom themed party?
q5.answer: Yes, we can fully customize the venue for an additional cost. Some examples of themes we have done in the past: Frozen, Mario, Paw Patrol. We also have special activities like bracelet making, cupcake decorations, ice-cream making, etc. You can also rent out our popcorn and snow cone machines!

q6.question: Are there any age limits for the venue?
q6.answer: Yes, we cater for kids between 1 - 12 years old. But there are no age limits for the parents!

about.heroDescription: Learn the story behind Montreal's easiest, most magical party spot.
about.storyTitle: It All Started With a Simple Idea...
about.storyParagraph1: Centre Funtastique was started by a mom who knows just how wild (and wonderful) kids' parties can be. After planning countless parties for her own children, she saw a need for a private, beautiful, and stress-free space where parents could actually enjoy the celebration.
about.storyParagraph2: Our goal is simple: to provide all the magic and fun of a big party, with none of the mess or stress. We handle the details so you can focus on making memories.
about.storyParagraph3: From the first balloon to the last goodbye, we're here to make sure your child's special day is truly unforgettable. Because every family deserves a party that's as fun for the parents as it is for the kids.
about.safetyDescription: Our space is designed to be a safe, clean, and secure environment for all our little guests.
about.magicDescription: We believe a party should be a magical escape. Our themes and activities are designed to spark imagination.
about.stressFreeDescription: Your only job is to show up and have fun. We'll take care of the setup, hosting, and cleanup.

themedParties.heroDescription: Explore our magical themes, designed to create unforgettable memories. We handle the custom decorations and details, you bring the smiles!

frozen.title: Frozen Party
frozen.description: An enchanted adventure with Elsa, Anna, and all your favorite friends.
frozen.tagline: Let It Go Into a Winter Wonderland!
frozen.detailDescription: Transform our space into Arendelle with this magical Frozen-themed party. Your little ones will feel like they've stepped into Elsa's ice palace, complete with shimmering snowflakes, blue and white décor, and enchanted activities that bring the movie to life.

included.backdrop: Custom Frozen backdrop with snowflake decorations
included.crafts: Snowflake craft station for creative fun
included.games: Themed party games led by your host
included.characters: Optional: Elsa & Anna character appearances (extra cost)

princess.title: Princess Party
princess.description: Step into a fairytale kingdom where every child becomes royalty for the day.
princess.detailDescription: Every child deserves to feel like royalty! Transform the venue into a magical castle with elegant princess decorations, tiaras, and enchanted activities fit for kings and queens. A fairytale celebration where dreams really do come true.

included.backdrop: Royal castle backdrop and elegant decorations
included.tiaras: Tiaras or crowns for all guests

cupcake.title: Cupcake Decorating
cupcake.description: Create sweet memories with hands-on cupcake decorating fun for all.
cupcake.detailDescription: Let your little bakers unleash their creativity! This hands-on cupcake decorating party provides everything needed for kids to frost, sprinkle, and design their own delicious masterpieces. Each child becomes a pastry chef for the day!

included.stations: Individual cupcake decorating stations for each child
included.toppings: Variety of colorful frostings and toppings
included.aprons: Chef hats and aprons for all guests
included.boxes: Take-home boxes for their sweet creations

bracelet.title: Bracelet Making
bracelet.description: Design and create beautiful friendship bracelets to take home.
bracelet.detailDescription: Design and create beautiful friendship bracelets in this craft-focused celebration! With colorful beads, charms, and endless design possibilities, every child will create unique pieces to take home and share with friends. A perfect party for creative minds!

included.stations: Individual bracelet-making stations with all supplies
included.beads: Variety of colorful beads, charms, and strings
included.instruction: Step-by-step instruction from your party host
included.boxes: Jewelry boxes to take creations home

cartoon.title: Cartoon Party
cartoon.description: Bring your child's favorite cartoon characters to life with vibrant decorations.
cartoon.tagline: Bring Your Favorite Characters to Life!
cartoon.detailDescription: Jump into a world of colorful fun with a cartoon-themed celebration! Whether it's superheroes, animated friends, or classic cartoons, we'll create a vibrant party atmosphere filled with your child's favorite characters. A customizable theme that matches their unique interests!

included.tableware: Vibrant, colorful table settings and balloons
included.photoBooth: Photo booth area with cartoon props

detail.service1Title: Private Kids Birthday Party Venue in {{location}}
detail.service1Desc: Looking for a children's birthday party venue near {{location}}? Our 1500 sq ft private party space is perfect for kids birthday celebrations with no shared bookings.
detail.service2Desc: Every kids party includes a dedicated party host who manages activities, serves food, and handles cleanup - making your child's birthday stress-free for parents in {{location}}.
detail.service3Desc: Popular kids birthday themes including Frozen parties, Princess parties, Cupcake decorating, Bracelet making, and custom birthday themes for children in {{location}}.
detail.service4Desc: Book your child's birthday party on weekends (10 AM - 8 PM) or weekdays by appointment. Convenient party times for {{location}} families.
detail.themesTitle: Popular Kids Birthday Party Themes for {{location}} Children
detail.themesDesc: Transform your child's birthday party with our themed party packages! Each children's birthday theme includes custom decorations, age-appropriate activities, and supplies. Perfect for kids birthday celebrations in {{location}}.
